body_html:
not official but http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#tensorflow

also don't mean to be rude, but

1.0 will not have python 3.6 support on windows.
We will check the adoption numbers for python itself to see if we will add support for TF 1.1

this is unacceptable, guys.

body:
not official but http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#tensorflow

also don't mean to be rude, but

> 1.0 will not have python 3.6 support on windows.
> We will check the adoption numbers for python itself to see if we will add support for TF 1.1

this is unacceptable, guys.
